items.sentence: Tom didn't eat the food that Mary prepared for him.
It never occurred to me that Tom wouldn't be there.
It never occurred to me that you'd want to do that.
The accident occurred just in front of Tom's house.
How often do you change the air filter in your car?
Why does everyone think I was the one who did that?
How often do you think you'll be able to come here?
It would be wise to focus on one problem at a time.
It would be wise to consider their offer carefully.
Tom and Mary live in a seedy rundown neighbourhood.
